website_summaries.verdict: It's a solid option if you want a shower curtain with a design that isn't too feminine or fussy, but consider the color you choose carefully.
pros: Has a lot to offer for a value price
Made of polyester fabric with a textured waffle-weave pattern
Comes in several attractive ombré color combinations
cons: The material seems thin, but our testers found that it's still durable and made to last

customer_reviews.title: Got my curtain today and I love it! Just enough color to brighten up the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my curtain today and I love it! Just enough color to brighten up the bathroom but not so much that it's obnoxious. I got the yellow and grey curtain, paired with grey rugs and it looks amazing! There was a slight blemish on the upper left corner of the yellow but it's not big enough for me to worry about sending it back. I did not use the clips that came with it, as I like the ones I already have better but they are very cute! I'd recommend this curtain.
customer_reviews.author: tabbi86

customer_reviews.title: Shower curtain is beautiful and looks EXACTLY like the photo in the description
customer_reviews.text: Shower curtain is beautiful and looks EXACTLY like the photo in the description. I got the gray ombre one. I tried to take a photo to attach to the review, but my phone introduced some purple undertones into the picture. The curtain is true dark gray at the bottom, not black (nor does it look black in the photo). The tiny circles have a slightly raised texture. Overall, I'm quite pleasantly surprised by the quality, especially for the price. The holes for hooks are a little bit flimsy and tore slightly when I put the curtain hooks through them. Otherwise, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SI801

customer_reviews.title: Multiple usage
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a baby shower back drop. It was perfect. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: R K

customer_reviews.title: so so....
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these shower curtains (actually turned them into living room curtains) - but the coloring between the two of them is awful. The gradient varies greatly between the two. One has a a very true white to grey to black coloring, while the other goes from white to bluish grey to black. Also the fabric is made up of MANY small circles of thread that easily catch on anything not smooth. I have a feeling that these are going to have some terrible runs in them very soon. They look cool, but just not made super well...
customer_reviews.author: Marky

customer_reviews.title: Black ombre is more blue/green/gray
customer_reviews.text: Very decent for the product itself. It's quality was designed for appearances but it's durability will lack because of it. I did however expect a perfect BLACK gradient, instead it's more hue-ish. Similar if you were to draw a circle with a black marker, then placed a few drops of water into the center to see what colors spread out that makes it up. Over all, satisfied for what it is, unfortunately will have to make use of it elsewhere than my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher M.

customer_reviews.title: nice color - build quality not that great
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this shower curtain after just browsing around. The color is vibrant and the curtain is true to its pictures. Unfortunately the stitching quality is not great. I see some really off stitching about a month after use. It doesn't impact its use but it's quite annoying to see. It's right at the leading edge where I usually hop and out of the shower. Oh well... Also the recommended bathmat is no where close to matching this color. Don't be a fool to buy it. I just use a grey mat since I haven't found anything to match it well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Montefiore

customer_reviews.title: No metal grommets
customer_reviews.text: The shower curtain is just OK, but when I started to put it up I was surprised there were only small slits in the fabric to hang it by. Even the inexpensive liners I got to go with it had metal grommets. I also found that rings get bent out of shape when bending over the curtain rod. The first one I tried to do snapped the little piece off where they snap together. Also one of the beads slipped off while installing and disappeared forever. I'm going to buy a new set for a few dollars more with double hooks at the bottom, one for the curtain and one for the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Orange color is NOTHING like what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: The picture in the listing for this shower curtain shows a gradation from orange at the bottom up to bright yellow and then white at the top. There is NO YELLOW in this shower curtain, at all, whatsoever. So it doesn't go with all of my yellow bath accessories, which is why I bought it to begin with. It goes from orange at the bottom to peach at the top, then white. Also, I thought that the shower rings that were included were going to have orange beads to match the curtain. They don't. They are boring old solid silver. So the whole set is a bust and is very disappointing. Expect to be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: THE HEM IS FRAYING IN SEVERAL PLACES AND THERE IS A FLAW IN THE MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: I received the dark grey shower curtain today. The shipping was on time. The material is very attractive and all in all it would have been a good purchase, except for the fact that there is a flaw in the material towards the bottom, where the color is at its darkest, resulting in holes in several places , which is evident when the curtain is opened, showing up as white marks or flaws. The hem also shows frayed areas in several areas. It is very disappointing when a vendor is quite prepared to take my hard earned cash from me and provide a sub-par or defective purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Botha

customer_reviews.title: There are better quality shower curtains....
customer_reviews.text: on Amazon or your local Target/ supermarket that are much less expensive. My biggest qualm with this purchase was that the material was too heavy... and every shower I took it felt like the plastic was subject to torrential downpour from a Category 5 hurricane. The prongs for the curtain rod are also cheaply made, so many of them ended up falling off or breaking. We replaced this within two months. This is one of the cheapest shower curtains on Amazon for a reason (!)
customer_reviews.author: Toni Airaksinen

customer_reviews.title: Decent. 1 Flaw but I can overlook it
customer_reviews.text: Giving less than a stellar review bc there was a hole right in the middle of the curtain. I’d seen another review where they had a hole as well but I thought I’d take my chances. It’s no big deal as no one but me goes in my bathroom but to someone else who itd bother, buyer be (a)ware. Also be VERY CAREFUL with the hangers supplied. They’re fragile but extras are given so it wasn’t a problem once I broke one. Be gentle.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: The shower curtain is nice, ordered the turquoise
customer_reviews.text: The shower curtain is nice, ordered the turquoise, which is more blue than turquoise in my opinion. My problem is that from one side of the shower curtain to the other, it isn't the same length and is larger than the stated size. One side is 73 inches long and the other is 74.5 inches. Not a huge deal, but you can tell just by looking at it that something's off and yes, the rod is level.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I loved the cloth material, but when I was putting the rings on my shower curtain one of the rings just snapped. I did not over stretch it, but if you are not very gentle they will break... I thought the material was just metal, but it turned out to be some type of plastic. Pretty disappointed since I have one missing ring. I would definitely not get this product again if I knew that the material was not durable.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is very modern and urban-chic. Great for the price. The ombre style is really trendy right now, and this shower curtain incorporates a perfect blend of easily matchable, easy on the eyes neutral colors. The transition from white to blush gray to gray is pleasing and gives the bathroom a calm backdrop. I will say, however, that although it looks like the ombre fades to black in the picture provided, it really only fades to a dark gray. Still pretty - but do think I may have liked it a little better had the ombre faded to black. Not bad for the price and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Dentist_chickTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: No colored rings for rod hooks
customer_reviews.text: Curtain is nice. I steam ironed it after hanging it on the rod and it looks a lot better. Rings are NOT colored like the listing shows, or at least the turquoise one isn’t. It shows turquoise rings for the rod hooks and we got ones what’s were only silver. I ordered a second curtain hoping it was an error & they didn’t have colored rings either. I’m a bit disappointed as it would have looked nicer with the colored rings. I kept one of the curtains and I returned the other.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: came as advertised, no complaints here. people in the future should know that it DOES in fact come with the pole hooks - I didn't see them at first and went to buy some and found them later, so don't waste the money on extra hooks, they're in there.
customer_reviews.author: paul frentz

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking curtain, grey fading to white. No complaints about the general appearance, though there was one small spot that looked like it hit a dirty production floor. My biggest complaint is the lack of grommets to protect the fabric when inserting the rings. Punching sharp metal hooks through barely done eyeholes meant snagging the fabric on every single one. I dread having to take it down to wash and rehang eventually. With grommets, it would look nicer hanging as well, instead looking like the hook is going to rip right through the fabric some day.
customer_reviews.author: SD6

customer_reviews.title: Longer, not as wide as a standard liner...
customer_reviews.text: Careful - this is just shy of a standard liner - I ran out of curtain and still had one more loop for the liner. I just skipped the next to the last hole on the liner and called it good. This curtain is longer than the liner. It is true to color and the fabric, while it could snag easily, almost gives the curtain a shiny effect. Took a close up so you can see... It is of a heavy enough weight to not feel too cheap. Would likely wash okay in the washer, but snagging could be an issue. Still a great deal considering it comes with shower hooks - and they're not ugly!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha LaRue

customer_reviews.title: pretty, but all the shower hooks snapped as soon as I opened them to put on the rod
customer_reviews.text: The curtain is pretty and hopefully will stand up to time. However if you buy this, be aware that you may have to get additional shower hooks, as the ones that came with mine were defective. You know, you take out the old, go to hang the new and poof, no shower hooks to put it up with. Very disheartening. Now I have to wait another two days to get proper shower hooks to hang the curtain. :(
customer_reviews.author: R T

customer_reviews.title: Falls short of the product photos
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with this one. For 20 bucks it's nice curtain. My expectations for it were a bit off. It's a much more vibrant colors in the photos, but is duller in person. Also, having purchased the teal one, in the pictures it shows that the included shower rings have real beads. Mine came in silver. Additionally I broke the first one I tried to slip on my shower rod. The metal sheared right in half. You may ha e to remove the entire rod and then slip them on the end. The shower rings are quite terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Neighslayer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this to be a closet "door" in my dorm room, and then used it as an actual shower curtain when I moved into an apartment. When it was being used for the first purpose, you couldn't even tell it was a shower curtain! It's really great aesthetically, and it's made of fabric, not plastic. It really seems like it should be more expensive than it is. Now in my bathroom, it looks great with my gray-and-purple color scheme and classes up my tiny shower. I'm really happy with it
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Hooks are horrible
customer_reviews.text: Put this up not even a week ago. The curtain is even more beautiful than I thought it would be. The hooks on the other than are horrible! Putting them through the curtain was annoying as they kept catching the material and ripping it (not much but enough that I was waiting for it to rip a hole). Than tonight I get in the shower and realize there is a hook missing and another spot had just 1/2 a hook! Not even a week up and 2 hooks snapped just by opening and closing the curtain for 2 people to shower. Now I need to go buy new hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Z.

customer_reviews.title: Brown stains - eww.
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed. This product received great reviews. I just opened the shower curtain package to find brown stains on it. Not sure what the stains are. I tried to scrub them off but they won’t rub off. Not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, the shower curtain was OK, but the rings supplied to hang it were JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Shower curtain was fine, but the rings supplied with the curtain were crap, they are METAL, very very brittle metal, four of them broke when I was attempting to attach the ringings to the curtain. I just needed a short term curtain while I wait for a shower door install or I would send this product back. Metal rings, so brittle you try to pry apart a bet to attach the curtain, they snap like a fragile ice cycle.
customer_reviews.author: run26mi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a curtain to look okay with the hideous wallpaper in our upstairs bathroom. We want to remodel but it won’t be for a while And this curtain matches pretty good and it actually is a lot better quality than I thought it would be, plus it comes with the hooks and is a very good price. This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Snags like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shower curtain for about 6 months. The ombre effect is nice. The stitching is very tight so there's a lot of puckering around the edges, and the first time I washed this (by itself, nothing else was in the washer), the fabric snagged badly so there were runs through the entire shower curtain. It's a very cheap fabric and a very cheap sewing job.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Was not happy at first as there were stains on it as soon as we opened up the package but after washing they came out so not a big deal I guess. But the material is now starting to fray and come apart :( So I'm sure we'll need to buy a new one sooner rather than later. It's a really pretty color but not worth it when the material is already falling apart and there were stains on it before we even put it in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Tones Not the Same and Received Silver Beaded Rings, Not Brown
customer_reviews.text: Received the chocolate ombre shower curtain and it looked a lot more like chocolate brown tones in the ad picture. In person, it has a little more golden with peachy tones. The beaded curtain rings were supposed to be brown beads and I got silver beads. Looked to be decent quality but I really wanted true brown tones. Also has a shine to it that I wasn't expecting since it looked more matte in the ad. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: TriciaG

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: This has such a luxe feel with the dotted texture, and is a great gender neutral and modern touch to our bathroom. Minus one star because the clips that come with it are useless, 2 snapped right at installation due to the pinched area that holds the beads in being pounded so thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kanitha

customer_reviews.title: Hooks are really flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The curtain itself looks great and fits my shower perfect, but the hooks were a big let down. They don't open very far so when I tried to clip them over the curtain rod I immediately broke one and those tiny little balls went flying everywhere. I was hoping there would he an extra one in the pack but there isn't, so now I'm just missing one until I buy more or get different ones. But they do slide nicely and make opening and closing the curtain easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: After looking and looking at a bunch of shower curtains on here and in store, I took a chance and got 2 of these for both bathrooms because I love the ombré look, and they’re amazing! I washed them before putting them up and they came out nice. Looks exactly like the picture, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cipriana M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking material.
customer_reviews.text: The material used for shower curtain snags very easily unfortunately and there are several spots on hem that look all chunky and messed up along seam. The hombre/fade is really pretty, so 1 star, the color is very true to this picture, 2 stars. And the length is perfect, 3 stars. I will be replacing however with a 100% cotton curtain soon though.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I like the curtain and would have bought for my intended purpose even if the description had been accurate. However, it was not as described and pictured. The curtain rings are not color beaded to the color of curtain but are cheap silver beaded ones. If I had been using this in my home and not at work, I would have likely sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The color wasn’t anything like the description or the photo (I know it can look different on different screens, but it wasn’t even close!) It’s not nearly as heavy as I thought either. Seems like it won’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: 2 rings broken upon opening package
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the rings were already broken upon opening the package. They are very thin and low quality. The ombre fabric is beautiful, however, and lets just the right amount of light through if you have natural light in your bathroom..
customer_reviews.author: Yu-han Chao

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, minor quality issue
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a year and a half and the grey started to take on a pinkish hue. Not sure why. I tried washing it as Ive done several times, but it didn't come out. My only thought is because I use a bleach spray to clean the bathroom. It's inexpensive enough to purchase every 18 months. Otherwise, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Has a texture pattern that is much more obvious in person.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really look like the photo. After closer inspection, you can see why, as the photo doesn't show well the little bubble texture. It isn't as much of a black and white gradient as I had hoped. Overall, I wish it looked more how I thought it would. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Ash6s

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color but dirty spots all over
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Teal colored shower curtain, which is absolutely beautiful! But when i opened it, there was what looked like dirt on it, i figured no big deal i can just clean it off. Upon cleaning it, the color also came off, it's only two small spots but it concerns me that whatever was on it wasnt dirt or that when it gets washed, the color will run out. Also as i was hanging it up i found a bunch more dirty spots. Thats just so weird to me, and kind of grosses me out.
customer_reviews.author: Kori R.

customer_reviews.title: The turquoise isn't as green as it looks in the photo!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy with this shower curtain, I was very afraid to order it because it's fairly green looking on my computer and I did not want green I was leaning toward a blue turquoise. And it is a fantastic blue turquoise!! The darker portion of the shower curtain at the bottom perfectly matches my towels! It's still a bit difficult to see the colors matching perfectly in my lousy photos but the do match!!
customer_reviews.author: sotensix

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn’t match, hooks aren’t as pictured, and breakable.
customer_reviews.text: Not the color in the picture at all, beads on hooks were silver, more than half the hooks broke when putting into place. Really disappointed. Didn’t even match the picture on the package. Probably will toss for something that matches better.
customer_reviews.author: ladyladylady

customer_reviews.title: It isn’t even gray!
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this curtain for a while. We are moving into a new home and I was looking for a gray and white theme. However when I received this shower curtain, I was disappointed. The fabric seems a little cheap. I usually get nice heavy duty shower curtains, so compared to those, yes it’s cheap. Gray? Has no hint of gray. It goes from white to a really light slate blue to navy blue. The colors are nice however it was not what I was looking for. Instead of going through the hassle of a return, I was able to resell it a family member. If you are looking for a gray curtain, this one isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: MMELLA

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am IN LOVE with this shower curtain. I got the grey and it matches my bathroom perfectly. This shower curtain literally makes me super happy every time I look at it. I am one to be super picky about decorating and I was insane skeptical on ordering a shower curtain online because I didn’t like anything I found in stores.. it took me over a week to finalize this order and I wish I did it sooner! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower curtain! I got it in turquoise and it's exactly like the picture! It's just as vibrant as I had hoped. Before it arrived, I was concerned it might be too dark but that is not the case. I even got matching metal hooks with turquoise beads on it. This curtain looks very nice and looks like it costs way more than 12 bucks! The picture doesn't do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: Merangel

customer_reviews.title: White-Gray-Green???
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, but I gave 3 stars because my curtain starts out white at the top, then fades into light grey and some how a gray-dark greenish color. I wanted just white grey black, but it’s a cheaper costing good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but snags
customer_reviews.text: It would be pretty IF it did not have multiple snags on it. It easily snagged and it did NOT come with the Teal shower curtain holders, the ones I received with mine where all chrome looking and 1 broke. I would NOT buy it and do NOT recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: McGee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material. Miscolored patch and loose string.
customer_reviews.text: There is a spot that missed the dyeing process I'm guessing. There's a loose string and a patch of whiteness under it. I'm very disappointed as it looked nice in the picture on here.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nightshade

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: I thought the fabric was pretty and felt nice for a shower curtain. Pretty color. When I went to hang it up n my kid's bathroom I noticed the hook holes in the curtain were sewn completely shut. A job that should've taken 5 minutes or less ended up taking 30 or more because I had to cut through layers of thread. After barely being able to make holes big enough two of the metal hooks snapped in half. The only reason I kept it and decided to use it is because we just moved into our home and my kids desperately needed a curtain. I'm disappointed and honestly want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not bad....
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit this was not what I expected, but I like it a lot. It is ombre but the color is debatable. It also has dots all over it that I was unaware of when I bought it. All that aside it looks pretty good and was a good price. I did have to buy a liner for it as it didn't come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Green

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Color is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Color is as advertised. Matches well with the Roommates wall decals butterflies. This is a standard size shower curtain. It could use a steam to get the creases out.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful...adds nice classy color. The fabric is shiny which I didn’t know. I would prefer it not to be but still, for the price I’m happy with the color and the effect it has in the bathroom. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Curtain. Okay Rings.
customer_reviews.text: Great shower curtain for the main bathroom. Very neutral and modern. Love the shiny texture. The curtain rings are cheaply made. I found it challenging to put them over the rod. I put them on as gently as I could and still ended up breaking one. I’d suggest getting separate rings from Target or Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not the shades I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a red curtain, and this one is very nice. I'm not sure if its just the one I got, but even at the darkest end of gradient, this still looks kind of pink-ish. I tried it under a florescent and incandescent bulb, and in natural light. It still looks kind of pink. Its is still nice, and while my husband is a little grumbly about it, I still like it and don't mind having it up until I find something else. You can't really see it in the picture, but it has little dots on it, that are a little shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Super frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this curtain. It looked great at first, but as I was unfolding it I saw that it was cover in little pink stains. I was disappointed, but figured that was easy enough to fix. I followed the washing instructions and put it in the washer. It’s very thin so it got stuck inside the bottom of the washer and repeatedly tore as I tried to get it out. It’s a very delicate fabric and was washed on a delicate cycle, but I guess it should be listed as a hand wash only item.... and shouldn’t come with stains on it to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful with Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The curtain itself is pretty true to the photo listed. HOWEVER, the way this item is packaged, SUCKS. The glue from the cardboard was on our actual curtain, so when I tried to get the packaging off to hang it up, it made a run in the curtain. Now it looks horrible on one end and I have to constantly pull it to make it where it doesn't look bunched up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Flanery-Gray

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. You can clearly see a wiggly white thread that was sewn wrong. Some of the holes to insert the clips were not opened . The clips that it came with broke very easily even though I was being gentle!
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and the color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It looks better in real life than in the picture! Very good quality for 100% polyester. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer P Parke

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great-looking shower curtain from nice material (although you do need a liner), and it is on the affordable side. The customer photos are more accurate than the description image, and that was what I was expecting because I bought it looking at the customer images. The aqua/turquoise color is great. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty blend of Turquoise shades !
customer_reviews.text: I like that the color is a true blend of Turquoise shades. There is a very small circle pattern in he fabric. Blends very easy with the southwest valance I had put it next to. The fabric is very light and hangs nice. I would tell you to get a medium weight clear shower curtain to give the set a nice combination of weight and balance. I found my best buys for chrome shower bar at the Home Goods store .
customer_reviews.author: Dena M

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with spots on it, total waste of money. Not worth mailing back.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The curtain itself is good. It’s an ombré shower curtain. It is what it is and it does what it says. However, it says it comes with the rings to hang it, which is technically true. I opened mine up and little Silver beads (from the rings) sprang our and rolled all over my floor. 4 of the rings are broken. So the curtain, with rings, isn’t as good of a value as I had originally thought. I’ll now be running to target to get rings to hang my curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a fairly big run in the material
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to return this because my old shower curtain is gross and this product still TECHNICALLY works as it should. Arrived with a big run/pull in the fabric tho, would seem quality control is lacking. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain gave my bathroom the "depth" I was looking for---the gray at the bottom matched my main rug, and I have 2 smaller rugs on either side that are a lighter blue. It is very light weight but very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: insurance lady

customer_reviews.title: This is not barn red.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't lived with it too long yet, but it is not the color described. At best, it is rose colored. For all of those asking, it is definitely cloth but has a synthetic feel. I'll leave durability up to someone who has had theirs more than a week, but this would have to be one of those purchases I regret now that I've seen it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Tobin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The Curtain is Great! The Beaded Rings Not So Great...
customer_reviews.text: I love the curtain. It allows some more light in than our old one and sticks to you less if you happen to brush against it. The beaded rings however are way too easy to break. They have no give what-so-ever and snap too easily. I was able to slide them on one end of the rod instead. Luckily I was able to work a support clamp and feed the rod's supporting wire through half of them in order to remount/hang it all...
customer_reviews.author: HibsKor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The colors are even better thaks in the picture, and the hangers have matching colored beads. Idk about how well it washes, as I've not put it through the wash yet. Highly recommend- great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Poor material, stained and wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Definitely had higher hopes for this product and I was totally disappointed. I don’t know if i received a defective curtain because the other reviews with photos look as described but I definitely got a more blue-toned curtain as opposed to getting a white/grey ombré. Also, my curtain had little brown stains (as picture) and there were sections where the thread bunched up. I wouldn’t purchase again and definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dorris G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality curtain
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when the shower curtain arrived. It was well made and looked attractive. It came with the silver beaded hooks which makes the curtain look classy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: One of the rings broke and the beads are not red like pictures show I used mine as a divider and it works great the beads are chrome I got the red one
customer_reviews.author: Renee E A

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks just like the picture. I got the teal to white one and it is a very nice teal. It is a bit on the longer side. A few inches of it was on the floor. It came with the curtain and the rings. The rings were a bit tedious to put on but I got it done in a few minutes. It's very pretty and I loved looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hooks, nice curtain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this curtain because it came with the hooks. I was very disappointed one of the hooks broke before I even got to hang it on the rod. Now I have to buy hooks anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric, a bit dressy but still very contemporary!
customer_reviews.text: Winner winner chicken dinner! After 4 tries, this curtain is almost perfect! I have grey blue walls and this goes so well. I can see it being somewhat of a kamelion going with several decors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last at all - gets pulls in it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July 2017. Did not use all year, as we change shower curtains during the holidays. Washed this probably 2-3 times total. The curtain has pulls in it throughout and it looks shaggy. Did not even last a year. Waste of money. Was pretty but now I have to find a better quality curtain. Was used with a shower liner.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Love the color (as shown)
customer_reviews.text: Love the color (as shown). The length of the curtain us perfect as it is long enough not to fall back into the wet shower. Easy to clean off if something gets on it. Dries fairly quickly if it gets wet. Nice product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I love the way it looks and the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Looks amazing in my new modern bathroom I just remodeled. Gets lots of compliments. Easy to wash and care for. Heavy duty and will last through many washes
customer_reviews.author: buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Mold growth and color fades over time. But it's good for short term use.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful when you buy it. Colors are vivid and nice. Over time mold does grow on it. I tried washing it and the mold wouldn't come off. The colors also faded over time with washes So it's good for short time use. But nothing long term I would recommend something that mold can't grow on. And it's cuz my restroom has poor circulation. I live in an old apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I love this shower curtain!!! It is so easy to get into and out of the shower with out disolacing it and hangs perfectly! The colors are fully enriched and unique' I am so happy I bought this aa i never seen one like it in common stores !
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a little skeptical buying online since I can't feel or see it in person but I'm glad I went ahead and bought this curtain. The material is nice and the color is absolutely stunning. My only gripe with it is that the hooks it came with don't have orange beads as advertised. They're just plain silver. But it's not a deal breaker by any means. The curtain itself is absolutely beautiful and I'm so excited to put it in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: They're cute and trendy
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student moving to a new place, and I saw these my favorite color is turquoise, and I am really into the ombre trend right now. I received them in a day, and I really like the curtains. The colors aren't as bright as in the picture, but I'm okay with that. I like that it comes with hooks so I didn't have to buy the separately. You do have to buy a liner thought I got one for $5. The curtains where a good price, and I over all like them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ledwig

customer_reviews.title: True color. Well-made.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo. True color. Adds a calming, not "too busy" touch to the bathroom. Holes for the hooks seem strong and fit over the larger hooks with the metal ball on the ends. Definitely use a liner as it would not be super waterproof on its own and, I imagine, would be prone to mildew if left wet. Happy with it after a month of everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: S. LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curtain! Great waffle knit fabric, and high quality. I even repurchased this in a different color for my boyfriend. Great option for a shower curtain that is cute but not too flashy or patterned!
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Braunagel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color and the length. I was hoping it would have little weights at the bottom to keep it from blowing in towards me while showering, but no biggie! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Harrington-Squyres

customer_reviews.title: I will update review if something is done about this stain
customer_reviews.text: I used a tide pen but it wasn’t able to remove it. The picture is what it looks like after a lot of scrubbing with tide pen. Usually I wouldn’t care but it’s right where I go to pull on it several times a day and it looks like a giant booger is just hanging out there.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It truly brightens a Room up and very nice product,so nice I don't want it ruined so I'm buying a Shower liner for it, Worth the Money
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, no holes
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. My shower curtain did not come with holes at the top... yes you read that correct. I didn’t know that was even possible to buy a curtain without holes. See photos, I had to poke my own holes, which is sad. I’m sure this was a manufacturer’s error. I will not be buying from here in the future. If you want quality, do not buy these. I will have to buy another curtain to replace these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Snower

customer_reviews.title: What I ordered verses what I actually got 🤨
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the turquoise shower curtain. The picture is what I ordered verses what I received yesterday. The color is waaaayyyyy off as you can see. I wanted something to brighten up my bathroom instead the shower curtain I received made it seem dull. The material seems to be nice, though I still bought a shower curtain liner to go with it. If you order from here I suggest you wait to receive your item before buying stuff to match if you're a very specific person.
customer_reviews.author: AprilShowers💦🌹

customer_reviews.title: 🙂
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it, but I had to trim pieces off of it because it was like pulls or something. But I do like it
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty - vibrant
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, vibrant colors, comes with cute silver rings with teal beads... just be aware you will need a liner for this. I thought I read no liner required somewhere but you definitely need one. It's soft cottony fabric. I put this on with no liner and while the bathroom did not get flooded, the thing absorbed a lot of water and after a few weeks started getting kinda stinky. Threw it in the wash, bought a liner, and I'm very happy with how it makes the bathroom look.
customer_reviews.author: typicalme

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Material is great quality. Looks so nice in the restroom.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: and this curtain is so pretty, plus it comes with the shower curtain rings
customer_reviews.text: I got the green one, and this curtain is so pretty, plus it comes with the shower curtain rings. Cannot imagine why others would give it negative reviews? Looks great as a contrast with my blue bathroom walls.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ellston Lonsway

customer_reviews.title: Curtain ok, Rings junk.
customer_reviews.text: Shower curtain is ok. I bit shiny, but ok. However, the rings the curtains come with are JUNK! All but 3 broke when I put them on the rod. Don’t rely on these. If you like the curtain, but separate rings.
customer_reviews.author: Ridale

customer_reviews.title: Base product is nice but the rest is garbage
customer_reviews.text: The curtian itself is nice, good size and color. Unfortunately the rings it comes with are poor quality, bending out of shape very easily and too small to fit most shower curtain rods. Also the holes in the curtain to string the rings through are just cut slits that you have to find yourself by feeling around for them. Don't know how you can mess up a shower curtain this bad like this but I guess anything is possible these days
customer_reviews.author: Willliam

customer_reviews.title: Low end
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy - low end product - dont like the wired holders at all - look for higher end brand
customer_reviews.author: jtb

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty, but not exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shower curtain, but I didn't realize it had the dots on it. I thought it was just a plain ombre pattern which is really what I wanted. Mine is a turquoise color and it's not quite as bright as the picture. It's definitely more of a blue in person. It's still pretty and I like it. It makes my bathroom brighter and adds some color. Decent value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: It does need a liner with it since it’s linen. The color quality is nice and really is ombré. It has a dot design when you look close, but it’s not noticeable or tacky. It had one little snag and it’s creased from being folded, but overall I’m pleased. It comes with matching hooks to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I hoped it to be but it’s really pretty. Can’t wait to redo my daughters bathroom and use this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely paired well with my remodeled bathroom and definitely worth the price. I loved that it is fabric instead of the plastic cheap curtains, so they’re easily washable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not how I would imagine the curtain to be
customer_reviews.text: The material was not how I expected it to be and it did not fade like how the picture portrays.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this one, I just absolutely love this shower curtain. My old one i had for 2 years and it was time for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! I redid the bathroom for Halloween 🎃 and it looked great
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Fragoso

customer_reviews.title: Not the colors I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is not silver and white ombré . It has teal in it ? No happy with that at all . Doesn’t mention that in the description at all
customer_reviews.author: Chad

product_meta.title: Creative Home Ideas Ombre Textured Shower Curtain with Beaded Rings, Marine Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Marine BlueEffortlessly give your bathroom a modern makeover with the Ombre Shower Curtain Set by Creative Home Ideas. Each on-trend ombre shower curtain is paired with twelve matching beaded shower curtain rings for an easy, stylish update. Durable, machine washable fabric in bright, bold colors makes these sets as fashionable as they are functional. Shower curtain hooks feature matching plastic beads on rust-resistant metal rings and fit a standard curtain rod. Vinyl curtain liner is recommended (sold separately). Machine wash cold, gentle cycle with mild detergent. Wash separately. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly. Low iron on reverse side. Shower curtain dimensions: 70" W x 72" L . 100% polyester. Imported.
feature_bullets: Set includes (1) 70" W x 72" L shower curtain and (12) metal hooks with color-coordinated plastic beads
Rust-resistant metal rings, reinforced buttonholes, and fade-resistant fabric make these as functional as they are fashionable
Vinyl shower curtain liner is recommended and sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,834 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
